title: [Large-scale] Situated Health Promotion Practice Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Health Management Knowledge and Lifestyle Improvement Strategies
context.additional_context: A program focused on bridging the knowledge-action gap through digitally supported real-life application activities.

learning_goals: Learners can establish three personalized health goals along with context-specific implementation strategies.
Learners can monitor and provide feedback on health behaviors at least three times daily using digital tools.
Learners can maintain an achievement rate of 80% or higher in target competencies for 4 weeks after completing the education.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
